name: NeoGenesis
description:
Doctor Evil is upto something. His Robots gets damaged only with same colored bullets. So is your suit. RED kills GREEN..GREEN kills RED.
Stop Doctor Evil's evil scheme.

Just 3 levels to complete. And 3 different ways to end.
